price: Thuaj: “Unë jam urdhëruar që ta adhuroj Allahun me përkushtim të sinqertë.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: qul innī umir'tu an aʿbuda al-laha mukh'liṣan lahu al-dīna
